name: Dockside Path
description: A well-worn path between the slums and the working docks.

name: Return to Ward
description: The path back to the Lower Ward from the docks.

name: Merchant Avenue
description: A longer walk through the middle ward to reach the respectable inn.

name: Return to Docks
description: The path back down to the working waterfront.

name: Market Shortcuts
description: Secret shortcuts through market alleys known only to locals.

accessRequirement.name: Market Insider Access
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The market vendors eye you suspiciously and block your path through their shortcuts.
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Build rapport with local merchants to learn their secret routes.

name: Guild Ferry Service
description: A comfortable ferry service reserved for guild members and their associates.

accessRequirement.name: Guild Associate Status
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The ferry captain checks his ledger. 'Guild associates only,' he says firmly.
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Establish strong trade relationships with guild merchants.

name: Evening Noble Carriage
description: A private carriage service that discreetly transports nobility through the lower districts.

accessRequirement.name: Noble Recognition
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The footman looks you over dismissively. 'This conveyance is reserved for persons of quality.'
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Even minimal noble connections grant access to exclusive services.

name: Shadow Passage
description: A dangerous route through criminal territory, but swift for those with the right connections.

accessRequirement.name: Criminal Contacts
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: Shadowy figures block the alley entrance. 'Not for you, stranger,' one growls.
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Underground connections open dangerous but efficient routes.

name: Scholar's Library Route
description: A quiet path through the scholar's quarter, accessible only to trusted friends of Elena.

accessRequirement.name: Elena's Trust
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The library guard shakes his head. 'Elena hasn't vouched for you.'
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Build a deep trust with Elena the Scribe to access scholarly routes.

name: Guild Street
description: An upscale street leading to the Merchant Guild headquarters.

accessRequirement.name: Merchant Standing
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The guild guards eye you skeptically. 'Guild business only.'
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Obtain at least an Apprentice Commerce Seal to enter the guild.

name: Return to Inn
description: The path back to the Merchant's Rest from the guild.

name: Courier's Lane
description: A busy lane where messengers rush to and from the guild hall.

name: Back to Docks
description: Return to the docks from the Courier's Guild.

name: Academic Avenue
description: An elegant avenue leading to the Scholar's Atheneum.

accessRequirement.name: Academic Recognition
accessRequirement.blockedMessage: The atheneum guards stop you. 'Scholars and nobility only.'
accessRequirement.hintMessage: Achieve Journeyman Status Seal to access the Scholar's Atheneum.

name: Return to Merchant Quarter
description: The path back to the merchant district from the scholar's quarter.
